channel.title: CVE Feed for POSIMYTH -- Nexter
channel.description: The latest CVEs for POSIMYTH -- Nexter

item.title: CVE-2023-45657|2024-09-05T15:36:25.792Z -- posimyth -- nexter
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in POSIMYTH Nexter allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Nexter: from n/a through 2.0.3.

item.title: CVE-2023-45658|2024-08-02T20:21:16.845Z -- posimyth -- nexter
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in POSIMYTH Nexter.This issue affects Nexter: from n/a through 2.0.3.
